summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS 2008 TOYOTA TUNDRA. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR RECALL 10V017000; VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL: ACCELERATOR PEDAL SEPTEMBER 8, 2010.  THE CONTACT STATED THE ORIGINAL ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS MODIFIED BUT THE DEALERSHIP CUT TOO MUCH OFF AND THE PEDAL WAS TOO SHORT AND HIGH. SHE WASN'T ABLE TO REACH OR MAINTAIN HER FOOT ON THE GAS PEDAL. SHE WAS AFRAID OF CRASHING. THE DEALER ADVISED THEY COULD REPLACE THE GAS PEDAL WITH THE MODIFIED PEDAL BUT IT WILL BE SMALLER AND SHORT THAN THE ORIGINAL MODIFICATION. THE MANUFACTURER TOOK A REPORT AND ADVISED HER THAT SHE COULD HAVE THE DEALER REPLACED THE GAS PEDAL. THE FAILURE AND THE CURRENT MILEAGE WERE 46,000.
